response: "{ \"title\": \"Maximum Sum of a Subarray\", \"description\": \"Given an array of integers, find the maximum sum of a subarray within it.\\n\\n#### Function Signature\\n```python\\ndef max_sum_subarray(arr: list[int)) -> int:\\n```\\n\\n#### Input\\n- `arr` (list[int]): A list of integers.\\n\\n#### Output\\n- Returns the maximum sum of a subarray within the input array.\\n\", \"code\": \"\\ndef max_sum_subarray(arr: list[int]) -> int:\\n    n = len(arr)\\n    if n == 0:\\n        return 0\\n    max_sum = arr[0]\\n    current_sum = arr[0]\\n    for i in range(1, n):\\n        current_sum = max(arr[i], current_sum + arr[i])\\n        max_sum = max(max_sum, current_sum)\\n    return max_sum\\n\", \"tests\": [\"assert max_sum_subarray([-2, 1, -3, 4, -1, 2, 1, -5, 4]) == 6\", \"assert max_sum_subarray([1, -2, 3, 10, -4, 7, 2, -5]) == 12\", \"assert max_sum_subarray([-1, -2, -3]) == -1\", \"assert max_sum_subarray([]) == 0\"] }"
